name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Randolph W. WRIGHT, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 356 Western District Allocatur Docket 1998

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Randolph W. WRIGHT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 6th day of October, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted but limited to the following:
Whether the Superior Court erred in finding that the trial court properly denied Petitioner’s motion to suppress the firearms seized from his residence?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
718 A.2d 1245
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Randolph W. WRIGHT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 6, 1998.
